Plot: Nicole, an introverted day dreamer, struggles to complete a screenplay based on 'La Dolce Vita.' Through casual glimpses of her crush, Marc, Nicole subconsciously enters Fellini-esque ...
Title: La Dolce Fantasia
Writer: Jessica Angiuoni, Jessica Angiuoni (story), Alan Michnoff
Actors: Jacob Frank, Valeria Gonzalez, Rod Simmons
